# Casino Website Project Setup Checklist

This checklist outlines the steps to set up a Next.js casino website with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ESLint, and the App Router, using Bun as the runtime.

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Overview

A full-featured casino website with:
- Home page showcasing available games
- Blackjack game implementation
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Built with Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, and Bun

## Getting Started

Run `bun run dev` to start the development server.

## Future Enhancements

- Add user authentication and balance system
- Implement more games (Roulette, Slots, etc.)
- Add betting mechanics
- Integrate real-time multiplayer features
